metadata.title: 1987 July-August Underway pCO

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Atmospheric and surface sea water pCO2 on board the NOAA ship, Oceanographer.  Measurements taken by PMEL scientists from July 29 to August 28, 1987.  Underway pCO2 data are available on-line via FTP.  See
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To create seasonal flux maps.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Contact Source.
